items.sentence: I suspect that Tom will probably regret what he did.
I take a walk almost every morning before breakfast.
Are you sure you don\'t want to go swimming with us?
At least you\'ll have something to write home about.
Why don\'t you believe Tom when he says he\'s happy?
I\'d love to marry you, but my family won\'t let me.
It took me some time to find what I was looking for.
Mary felt like Tom was undressing her with his eyes.
My doctor told me that I needed to lose some weight.
I\'m sure if you put your mind to it, you can do it.
